getSelectorImplementation2(bytes4).details: view implementation address of selector of function

implementation2(uint256).details: view implementation address of the proxy[index]

setImplementation2(address,uint256,bool).details: set the implementation address and status of the proxy[index]

params._data: Calldata to delegatecall the new implementation with.

upgradeToAndCall(address,bytes).notice: Set the implementation and call a function in a single transaction. Useful to ensure         atomic execution of initialization-based upgrades.
